current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To require notification of individuals of breaches of personally identifiable information through Exchanges under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
